hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
sudo apt-get -y update sudo apt-get -y install ruby ruby-dev make gcc g++
export GEM_HOME=/home/test/.gem/ruby export PATH=/home/test/.gem/ruby/bin:$PATH
sudo gem install mongo -v 2.5.1
# Start mongodb server sudo apt-get install -y wget wget https://repo.mongodb.com/apt/ubuntu/dists/xenial/mongodb-enterprise/3.6/multiverse/binary-s390x/mongodb-enterprise-server_3.6.2_s390x.deb sudo dpkg -i --force-all mongodb-enterprise-server_3.6.2_s390x.deb sudo apt-get install -y -f sudo mkdir -p db sudo /usr/bin/mongod --dbpath db & sleep 40s
echo -e "{\"_id\"=>BSON::ObjectId('000002aafe4122006d000002'), \"company\"=>\"IBM\", \"project\"=>\"MongoDB Driver\", \"language\"=>\"Ruby\", \"version\"=>\"2.5.1\"} {\"_id\"=>1, \"line\"=>1} {\"_id\"=>2, \"line\"=>2} {\"_id\"=>3, \"line\"=>3} "> expected_result.log
echo -e " require \"mongo\"
server=\"localhost\" test_db=\"ibm_test_db2\" collection=\"mongodb_ruby_driver_2_x\"
server_addr=server + \":27017\"
Mongo::Logger.logger.level = ::Logger::FATAL # hide DEBUG logging
db = Mongo::Client.new([ server_addr ], :database => test_db)
db[:collection].drop
result = db[:collection].insert_one({ company: \"IBM\" , project: \"MongoDB Driver\", language: \"Ruby\", version: \"2.5.1\"})
3.times { |i| db[:collection].insert_one({ _id: i+1, line: i+1 }) }
db[:collection].find().each do |document| printf(\"%s \\\n \", document)#=> Yields a BSON::Document. end" > test.rb
#export GEM_HOME=~/.gem/ruby ruby test.rb > test_result.log
sed -i "s/ObjectId('[0-9 a-z]*')/'_id'/" test_result.log sed -i "s/ObjectId('[0-9 a-z]*')/'_id'/" expected_result.log
sed '/^\s*$/d' test_result.log > file1.txt sed '/^\s*$/d' expected_result.log > file2.txt
diff --suppress-common-lines file1.txt file2.txt
if [ "$?" -eq 0 ]; then echo "OUTPUT FROM DATABASE" cat file1.txt exit 0 else exit 1 fi
